dmca.title: Blogger Gets Bagged
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

We represent Coquette International Inc., owner of the mark COQUETTE.  Attached is our letter concerning your use of the mark COQUETTE for your fashion blog.

We look forward to receiving your response.

Tassan & Hardison
Attorneys At Law
4143 North 27th Street
Arlington, Virginia 22207-5211

[private]

VIA E-MAIL and MAIL
[private]

May 4, 2006

[private]
San Francisco, California 94132-9998

c/o O'Reilly Media, Inc.
1005 Gravenstein Highway
North Sebastopol, California 95472

Re:    Coquette International Inc.
Trademark Infringement

Dear [private]:

We are U.S. intellectual property counsel for Coquette International Inc. (
